entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late this evening. 40 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17. POP 40%
